_source.productDescription:
Bringing together the brightest stars from the 2025 Melbourne International Comedy Festival, they’re delivering top-tier humour straight to your town!

Featuring a dynamic line-up of comedy legends and fresh faces, this year’s Roadshow promises nation-wide happiness. So, grab your friends, lock in your tickets and prepare for a much-needed dose of laughter as the 2025 Melbourne International Comedy Festival Roadshow rolls into Toowoomba!

Performances often contain coarse language, adult themes, sexual references and material that may offend. The show is recommended for people aged 15 years or older.

Smoke Machine/Hazer may be used during this performance.
_source.productShortDescription: Bringing together the brightest stars from the 2025 Melbourne International Comedy Festival, we’re delivering top-tier humour straight to your town!

attributes.attributeTypeIdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.
attributes.attributeIdDescription: Caters for people with sufficient mobility to climb a few steps but who would benefit from fixtures to aid balance. (This includes people using walking frames and mobility aids)

accessibilityAttributes.attributeSubType1IdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Offer multiple options for booking - web, email, phone
Offer a range of contact methods for receiving complaints
Accept the Companion Card
Employ people with disability
Train your staff in disability awareness

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Welcomes and assists people who have challenges with learning, communication, understanding and behaviour. (includes people with autism, intellectual disability, Down syndrome, acquired brain injury (ABI), dyslexia and dementia)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Train your staff in communicating with people with learning or behavioural challenges
Use Plain English / easy read signage and information (includes menus and emergency information)
A quiet space is available at the venue/ facility

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with sufficient mobility to climb a few steps but who would benefit from fixtures to aid balance. (This includes people using walking frames and mobility aids)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Use floors/coverings which are slip resistant, firm and smooth
Use non-slip tiles in the bathroom or slip resistant matting
Have grab rails in the bathroom
Provide seating in common areas including reception area

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who use a wheelchair.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have step free outdoor pathways (includes picnic areas, barbecues and shelters)
Have a doorbell or intercom at an accessible height and display a contact number (accessible height is 900mm-1100 mm)
Have a step free main entrance to the building and/or reception area (includes ramps or slopes with a maximum gradient of 1:14, otherwise are too steep for wheelchairs)
Have step free access to restaurant, lounge and bar
Have step free access to the conference or function room
Have accessible seating areas in theatrette
Have lifts with enough space for people using a mobility aid to enter and turn around to use the lift buttons. Buttons are at accessible height.
Have doorways which are easy to open and have lever handles (doorways 850mm or wider when open and not heavy)
Have an accessible public toilet which is unlocked

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with allergies and intolerances.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Modify your cooking and cleaning practices to cater for people with food allergies or chemical intolerances (could include menus with meals free from: nuts, dairy, seafood, eggs, gluten etc)
Train your staff to respond to allergic reactions
Adhere to The Food Authority requirements for allergy management in food preparation

productComments.commentText:
Bringing together the brightest stars from the 2025 Melbourne International Comedy Festival, they’re delivering top-tier humour straight to your town!

Featuring a dynamic line-up of comedy legends and fresh faces, this year’s Roadshow promises nation-wide happiness. So, grab your friends, lock in your tickets and prepare for a much-needed dose of laughter as the 2025 Melbourne International Comedy Festival Roadshow rolls into Toowoomba!

Performances often contain coarse language, adult themes, sexual references and material that may offend. The show is recommended for people aged 15 years or older.

Smoke Machine/Hazer may be used during this performance.

2025 年墨尔本国际喜剧节的明星们齐聚一堂，将顶级幽默直接带到您的城镇！

今年的路演阵容强大，喜剧传奇和新面孔应有尽有，保证全国人民都开心。所以，赶快带上您的朋友，锁定您的门票，准备好在 2025 年墨尔本国际喜剧节路演进入图文巴时尽情欢笑吧！

表演通常包含粗俗语言、成人主题、性暗示和可能令人反感的内容。建议 15 岁及以上的人观看该节目。

表演期间可能会使用烟雾机/烟雾器。

Réunissant les plus grandes stars du Melbourne International Comedy Festival 2025, ils vous proposent un humour de premier ordre directement dans votre ville !

Avec une programmation dynamique de légendes de la comédie et de nouveaux visages, le Roadshow de cette année promet du bonheur dans tout le pays. Alors, rassemblez vos amis, réservez vos billets et préparez-vous à une dose de rire bien nécessaire alors que le Melbourne International Comedy Festival Roadshow 2025 se déroule à Toowoomba !

Les représentations contiennent souvent un langage grossier, des thèmes pour adultes, des références sexuelles et du matériel pouvant offenser. Le spectacle est recommandé aux personnes âgées de 15 ans ou plus.

Des machines à fumée/à brouillard peuvent être utilisées pendant cette représentation.

Reuniendo a las estrellas más brillantes del Festival Internacional de Comedia de Melbourne 2025 ¡traerán humor de primer nivel directamente a tu ciudad!

Con una dinámica alineación de leyendas de la comedia y caras nuevas, el Roadshow de este año promete felicidad en todo el país. Así que, reúne a tus amigos, reserva tus entradas y prepárate para una dosis muy necesaria de risas cuando el Roadshow del Festival Internacional de Comedia de Melbourne 2025 llegue a Toowoomba.

Las presentaciones suelen contener lenguaje grosero, temas para adultos, referencias sexuales y material que puede ofender. El espectáculo está recomendado para personas mayores de 15 años.

Se pueden usar máquinas de humo o nebulizadores durante esta presentación.

他們匯集了 2025 年墨爾本國際喜劇節最耀眼的明星，將頂級幽默直接帶到您的小鎮！

今年的巡迴演出以充滿活力的喜劇傳奇人物和新面孔為特色，承諾全國範圍內的幸福。所以，帶上你的朋友，鎖定你的門票，準備好迎接 2025 年墨爾本國際喜劇節路演在圖文巴舉辦的急需的歡笑吧！

表演通常包含粗俗語言、成人主題、性暗示和可能冒犯的內容。建議 15 歲或以上的人士觀看該節目。

表演期間可能會使用煙霧機/煙霧機。

Reunindo as estrelas mais brilhantes do Melbourne International Comedy Festival de 2025, eles estão trazendo humor de primeira linha direto para sua cidade!

Apresentando uma programação dinâmica de lendas da comédia e rostos novos, o Roadshow deste ano promete felicidade nacional. Então, reúna seus amigos, garanta seus ingressos e prepare-se para uma dose muito necessária de risadas enquanto o Melbourne International Comedy Festival Roadshow de 2025 chega a Toowoomba!

As apresentações geralmente contêm linguagem grosseira, temas adultos, referências sexuais e material que pode ofender. O show é recomendado para pessoas com 15 anos ou mais.

Smoke Machine/Hazer podem ser usados durante esta apresentação.

Riunendo le stelle più brillanti del Melbourne International Comedy Festival del 2025, stanno portando un umorismo di alto livello direttamente nella tua città!

Con una formazione dinamica di leggende della comicità e volti nuovi, il Roadshow di quest'anno promette felicità a livello nazionale. Quindi, chiama i tuoi amici, blocca i biglietti e preparati per una dose di risate tanto necessaria mentre il Melbourne International Comedy Festival Roadshow del 2025 arriva a Toowoomba!

Le esibizioni contengono spesso linguaggio volgare, temi per adulti, riferimenti sessuali e materiale che potrebbe offendere. Lo spettacolo è consigliato a persone di età pari o superiore a 15 anni.

Durante questa esibizione è possibile utilizzare Smoke Machine/Hazer.

2025年メルボルン国際コメディフェスティバルの最も輝かしいスターを集め、トップクラスのユーモアをあなたの街に直接お届けします！

コメディ界の伝説と新人のダイナミックなラインナップを特徴とする今年のロードショーは、全国に幸福を約束します。友達を集めてチケットを確保し、2025年メルボルン国際コメディフェスティバルロードショーがトゥーンバにやって来るときに、待ちに待った笑いを準備しましょう！

パフォーマンスには、下品な言葉、大人向けのテーマ、性的な言及、不快な内容が含まれることがよくあります。ショーは15歳以上の方にお勧めです。

このパフォーマンスでは、スモークマシン/ヘイザーが使用される場合があります。

Dengan menghadirkan bintang-bintang paling cemerlang dari Festival Komedi Internasional Melbourne 2025, mereka akan menghadirkan humor kelas atas langsung ke kota Anda!

Menampilkan jajaran legenda komedi yang dinamis dan wajah-wajah baru, Roadshow tahun ini menjanjikan kebahagiaan di seluruh negeri. Jadi, ajak teman-teman Anda, dapatkan tiket Anda, dan bersiaplah untuk tawa yang sangat dibutuhkan saat Roadshow Festival Komedi Internasional Melbourne 2025 berlangsung di Toowoomba!

Pertunjukan sering kali mengandung bahasa kasar, tema dewasa, referensi seksual, dan materi yang dapat menyinggung. Pertunjukan ini direkomendasikan untuk orang yang berusia 15 tahun ke atas.

Mesin Asap/Pengacau dapat digunakan selama pertunjukan ini.

Sie bringen die hellsten Sterne des Melbourne International Comedy Festival 2025 zusammen und bringen erstklassigen Humor direkt in Ihre Stadt!

Mit einem dynamischen Lineup aus Comedy-Legenden und neuen Gesichtern verspricht die diesjährige Roadshow landesweite Freude. Also schnappen Sie sich Ihre Freunde, sichern Sie sich Ihre Tickets und bereiten Sie sich auf eine dringend benötigte Portion Gelächter vor, wenn die Melbourne International Comedy Festival Roadshow 2025 in Toowoomba eintrifft!

Die Aufführungen enthalten oft obszöne Sprache, Themen für Erwachsene, sexuelle Anspielungen und Material, das anstößig sein kann. Die Show wird für Personen ab 15 Jahren empfohlen.

Während dieser Aufführung können Nebelmaschinen/Hazer verwendet werden.

2025년 멜버른 국제 코미디 페스티벌의 가장 뛰어난 스타들을 모아서 여러분의 마을에 최고의 유머를 직접 전달합니다!

코미디 전설과 새로운 얼굴로 구성된 역동적인 라인업을 특징으로 하는 올해의 로드쇼는 전국적인 행복을 약속합니다. 그러니 친구들을 모으고 티켓을 확보하고 2025년 멜버른 국제 코미디 페스티벌 로드쇼가 투움바로 향하면서 절실히 필요한 웃음을 준비하세요!

공연에는 종종 거친 언어 성인용 주제 성적 참조 및 불쾌감을 줄 수 있는 자료가 포함됩니다. 이 쇼는 15세 이상의 사람들에게 권장됩니다.

이 공연에서는 Smoke Machine/Hazer를 사용할 수 있습니다.

_source.productDescription:
All aboard for a wellness journey like no other!

Step into a world where strength meets serenity with their unique Pilates in Motion event aboard the Silver Bullet. 

Join in for a revitalising morning hosted by Balanced Elements, blending the magic of heritage rail travel with the invigorating benefits of Pilates in the stunning Mary Valley.

Here's how your morning unfolds:
Set off from the historic Gympie Station, taking in the peaceful countryside as you journey to Amamoor.

Pilates on the lawn – upon arrival at Amamoor, roll out your mat on the lush green and immerse yourself in a guided Pilates session, surrounded by the beauty of nature.

Scones, tea and coffee – after your session, reboard the train and unwind with freshly baked scones, tea and coffee as the Silver Bullet gently rolls back to Gympie.

This approximately three hour experience is the perfect way to refresh your body, mind and soul. Whether you're a Pilates pro or new to the mat, this event is designed for everyone looking to balance movement and mindfulness with a touch of historic charm.
_source.productShortDescription: Step into a world where strength meets serenity with their unique Pilates in Motion event aboard the Silver Bullet.

productComments.commentText:
All aboard for a wellness journey like no other!

Step into a world where strength meets serenity with their unique Pilates in Motion event aboard the Silver Bullet. 

Join in for a revitalising morning hosted by Balanced Elements, blending the magic of heritage rail travel with the invigorating benefits of Pilates in the stunning Mary Valley.

Here's how your morning unfolds:
Set off from the historic Gympie Station, taking in the peaceful countryside as you journey to Amamoor.

Pilates on the lawn – upon arrival at Amamoor, roll out your mat on the lush green and immerse yourself in a guided Pilates session, surrounded by the beauty of nature.

Scones, tea and coffee – after your session, reboard the train and unwind with freshly baked scones, tea and coffee as the Silver Bullet gently rolls back to Gympie.

This approximately three hour experience is the perfect way to refresh your body, mind and soul. Whether you're a Pilates pro or new to the mat, this event is designed for everyone looking to balance movement and mindfulness with a touch of historic charm.

踏上独一无二的健康之旅！

踏上银子弹列车 (Silver Bullet) 独特的普拉提动感之旅，感受力量与宁静的交融。

加入由 Balanced Elements 主办的活力清晨，在风景秀丽的玛丽谷 (Mary Valley) 体验普拉提带来的活力，感受传统铁路旅行的魅力与活力四射的普拉提带来的益处。

您的清晨将如何展开：
从历史悠久的金皮火车站 (Gympie Station) 出发，沿途欣赏宁静的乡村风光，前往阿玛莫尔 (Amamoor)。

草坪普拉提——抵达阿玛莫尔后，在郁郁葱葱的草坪上铺开瑜伽垫，在教练的指导下，沉浸在自然美景之中，体验普拉提的魅力。

烤饼、茶和咖啡——课程结束后，重新登上火车，在银子弹列车缓缓驶回金皮的途中，享用新鲜出炉的烤饼、茶和咖啡，放松身心。

这大约三个小时的体验是焕活身心、净化心灵的完美方式。无论您是普拉提专业人士还是新手，这项活动都是为所有寻求在运动和正念之间取得平衡并带有一丝历史魅力的人而设计的。

특별한 웰니스 여정을 함께 떠나요!

실버 불릿 열차에서 펼쳐지는 특별한 필라테스 인 모션 이벤트로 힘과 평온이 만나는 세상으로 들어가 보세요.

밸런스드 엘리먼트가 주최하는 활기찬 아침 시간에 함께하세요. 유서 깊은 기차 여행의 마법과 아름다운 메리 밸리에서 필라테스의 활력을 더하는 특별한 경험을 선사합니다.

아침 일정은 다음과 같습니다.
유서 깊은 짐피 역에서 출발하여 평화로운 시골 풍경을 감상하며 아마무어로 향합니다.

잔디밭 필라테스 - 아마무어에 도착하면 싱그러운 잔디밭에 매트를 깔고 자연의 아름다움에 둘러싸인 채 가이드의 필라테스 수업에 푹 빠져보세요.

스콘 차 커피 - 수업 후 기차에 다시 올라타 갓 구운 스콘 차 커피를 즐기며 실버 불릿 열차가 짐피로 부드럽게 돌아오는 동안 휴식을 취하세요.

약 3시간 동안 진행되는 이 프로그램은 몸과 마음 그리고 영혼에 활력을 불어넣는 완벽한 방법입니다. 필라테스 전문가이든 매트 초보자이든 이 이벤트는 역사적인 매력을 더해 움직임과 마음챙김의 균형을 이루고자 하는 모든 사람을 위해 고안되었습니다.

Embarquez pour un voyage bien-être unique !

Plongez dans un monde où force et sérénité se rencontrent grâce à leur événement unique Pilates in Motion à bord du Silver Bullet.

Participez à une matinée revitalisante animée par Balanced Elements, alliant la magie d'un voyage en train historique aux bienfaits revigorants du Pilates dans la magnifique vallée de la Mary.

Voici le déroulement de votre matinée :
Départ de la gare historique de Gympie et immersion dans la campagne paisible en direction d'Amamoor.

Pilates sur la pelouse : à votre arrivée à Amamoor, déroulez votre tapis sur la verdure luxuriante et plongez dans une séance de Pilates guidée, au cœur de la beauté de la nature.

Scones, thé et café : après votre séance, remontez à bord du train et détendez-vous avec des scones fraîchement préparés, du thé et du café, tandis que le Silver Bullet retourne doucement à Gympie.

Cette expérience d'environ trois heures est idéale pour ressourcer votre corps, votre esprit et votre âme. Que vous soyez un pro du Pilates ou un nouveau venu sur le tapis, cet événement est conçu pour tous ceux qui cherchent à équilibrer le mouvement et la pleine conscience avec une touche de charme historique.

Todos a bordo para uma jornada de bem-estar como nenhuma outra!

Entre em um mundo onde a força encontra a serenidade com o evento exclusivo Pilates in Motion a bordo do Silver Bullet.

Participe de uma manhã revitalizante organizada pela Balanced Elements, que combina a magia das viagens ferroviárias tradicionais com os benefícios revigorantes do Pilates no deslumbrante Mary Valley.

Veja como será sua manhã:
Partindo da histórica Estação Gympie, aprecie a tranquilidade do campo enquanto viaja para Amamoor.

Pilates no gramado – ao chegar a Amamoor, estenda seu tapete sobre a vegetação exuberante e mergulhe em uma sessão guiada de Pilates, cercado pela beleza da natureza.

Scones, chá e café – após a sessão, embarque novamente no trem e relaxe com scones, chá e café fresquinhos enquanto o Silver Bullet retorna suavemente para Gympie.

Esta experiência de aproximadamente três horas é a maneira perfeita de revigorar seu corpo, mente e alma. Seja você um profissional de Pilates ou um novato no mat, este evento foi criado para todos que buscam equilibrar movimento e atenção plena com um toque de charme histórico.

Semua orang siap untuk perjalanan kebugaran yang tiada duanya!

Masuki dunia tempat kekuatan bertemu ketenangan dengan acara Pilates in Motion yang unik di atas Silver Bullet.

Bergabunglah untuk pagi yang menyegarkan yang diselenggarakan oleh Balanced Elements, memadukan keajaiban perjalanan kereta api bersejarah dengan manfaat Pilates yang menyegarkan di Mary Valley yang menakjubkan.

Beginilah cara Anda menjalani pagi hari:
Berangkat dari Stasiun Gympie yang bersejarah, nikmati pedesaan yang damai saat Anda melakukan perjalanan ke Amamoor.

Pilates di halaman rumput – saat tiba di Amamoor, gelar matras Anda di hamparan hijau yang subur dan benamkan diri Anda dalam sesi Pilates yang dipandu, dikelilingi oleh keindahan alam.

Kue scone, teh, dan kopi – setelah sesi Anda, naik kembali ke kereta dan bersantailah dengan kue scone yang baru dipanggang, teh, dan kopi saat Silver Bullet meluncur kembali ke Gympie.

Pengalaman sekitar tiga jam ini adalah cara yang sempurna untuk menyegarkan tubuh, pikiran, dan jiwa Anda. Baik Anda seorang profesional Pilates atau baru pertama kali mencoba matras, acara ini dirancang bagi siapa pun yang ingin menyeimbangkan gerakan dan perhatian dengan sentuhan pesona bersejarah.

¡Todos a bordo para un viaje de bienestar sin igual!

Adéntrese en un mundo donde la fuerza se fusiona con la serenidad con su exclusivo evento Pilates en Movimiento a bordo del Silver Bullet.

Disfrute de una mañana revitalizante organizada por Balanced Elements, que combina la magia de un viaje en tren histórico con los beneficios vigorizantes del Pilates en el impresionante Valle de Mary.

Así es como se desarrolla su mañana:
Salga de la histórica estación de Gympie y disfrute de la tranquilidad del campo mientras viaja hacia Amamoor.

Pilates en el césped: al llegar a Amamoor, extienda su esterilla sobre el exuberante verde y sumérjase en una sesión guiada de Pilates, rodeado de la belleza de la naturaleza.

Scones, té y café: después de la sesión, vuelva al tren y relájese con scones recién horneados, té y café mientras el Silver Bullet regresa suavemente a Gympie.

Esta experiencia de aproximadamente tres horas es la manera perfecta de refrescar cuerpo, mente y alma. Ya sea que seas un profesional de Pilates o nuevo en el mat, este evento está diseñado para todos aquellos que buscan equilibrar el movimiento y la atención plena con un toque de encanto histórico.

踏上獨一無二的健康之旅！

踏上銀子彈列車 (Silver Bullet) 獨特的普拉提動態之旅，感受力量與寧靜的交融。

加入由 Balanced Elements 主辦的活力清晨，在風景秀麗的瑪麗谷 (Mary Valley) 體驗普拉提帶來的活力，感受傳統鐵路旅行的魅力與活力四射的普拉提帶來的益處。

您的清晨將如何展開：
從歷史悠久的金皮火車站 (Gympie Station) 出發，沿途欣賞寧靜的鄉村風光，前往阿瑪莫爾 (Amamoor)。

草坪普拉提－抵達阿瑪莫爾後，在鬱鬱蔥蔥的草坪上鋪開瑜珈墊，在教練的指導下，沉浸在自然美景之中，體驗普拉提的魅力。

烤餅、茶和咖啡——課程結束後，重新登上火車，在銀子彈列車緩緩駛回金皮的途中，享用新鮮出爐的烤餅、茶和咖啡，放鬆身心。

這大約三個小時的體驗是煥活身心、淨化心靈的完美方式。無論您是普拉提專業人士還是新手，這項活動都是為所有尋求在運動和正念之間取得平衡並帶有一絲歷史魅力的人而設計的。

Alle einsteigen für eine Wellnessreise der besonderen Art!

Tauchen Sie ein in eine Welt, in der Kraft auf Gelassenheit trifft – mit dem einzigartigen Pilates in Motion-Event an Bord der Silver Bullet.

Verbringen Sie einen erholsamen Morgen mit Balanced Elements und verbinden Sie die Magie einer historischen Bahnreise mit den belebenden Vorteilen von Pilates im atemberaubenden Mary Valley.

So verläuft Ihr Morgen:
Starten Sie am historischen Bahnhof Gympie und genießen Sie die friedliche Landschaft auf Ihrer Reise nach Amamoor.

Pilates auf dem Rasen – Nach Ihrer Ankunft in Amamoor rollen Sie Ihre Matte auf dem üppigen Grün aus und tauchen ein in eine geführte Pilates-Sitzung, umgeben von der Schönheit der Natur.

Scones, Tee und Kaffee – Nach Ihrer Sitzung steigen Sie wieder in den Zug und entspannen bei frisch gebackenen Scones, Tee und Kaffee, während die Silver Bullet sanft zurück nach Gympie rollt.

Dieses etwa dreistündige Erlebnis ist die perfekte Möglichkeit, Körper, Geist und Seele zu erfrischen. Egal, ob Sie Pilates-Profi sind oder neu auf der Matte, diese Veranstaltung ist für alle gedacht, die Bewegung und Achtsamkeit mit einem Hauch von historischem Charme in Einklang bringen möchten.

Tutti a bordo per un viaggio benessere senza pari!

Immergetevi in un mondo in cui la forza incontra la serenità con il loro esclusivo evento Pilates in Motion a bordo del Silver Bullet.

Partecipate a una mattinata rigenerante offerta da Balanced Elements, che unisce la magia dei viaggi in treno storici con i benefici rinvigorenti del Pilates nella splendida Mary Valley.

Ecco come si svolge la vostra mattinata:
Partenza dalla storica stazione di Gympie, immersi nella tranquillità della campagna durante il viaggio verso Amamoor.

Pilates sul prato: all'arrivo ad Amamoor, stendete il vostro tappetino sul verde lussureggiante e immergetevi in una sessione guidata di Pilates, circondati dalla bellezza della natura.

Scone, tè e caffè: dopo la sessione, risalite sul treno e rilassatevi con scone appena sfornati, tè e caffè mentre il Silver Bullet torna dolcemente a Gympie.

Questa esperienza di circa tre ore è il modo perfetto per rigenerare corpo, mente e anima. Che siate professionisti del Pilates o principianti, questo evento è pensato per tutti coloro che desiderano trovare l'equilibrio tra movimento e consapevolezza, con un tocco di fascino storico.

さあ、他に類を見ないウェルネスの旅へ出発！

シルバーブレット号で開催される、ユニークなピラティス・イン・モーション・イベントで、力強さと静寂が融合する世界へ足を踏み入れましょう。

Balanced Elementsが主催する、歴史ある鉄道の旅の魔法と、息を呑むほど美しいメアリーバレーでピラティスの爽快な効果を融合させた、活力あふれる朝をお過ごしください。

朝の流れは以下の通りです。
歴史あるジムピー駅から出発し、静かな田園風景を眺めながらアマムーアへ向かいます。

芝生でのピラティス – アマムーアに到着したら、緑豊かな芝生の上にマットを広げ、美しい自然に囲まれながら、ガイド付きのピラティスセッションに浸りましょう。

スコーン、紅茶、コーヒー – セッション後は、シルバーブレット号に再び乗り込み、焼きたてのスコーン、紅茶、コーヒーでリラックスしながら、ゆっくりとジムピーへ戻ります。

約3時間のこの体験は、心身ともにリフレッシュするのに最適です。このイベントは、ピラティスのプロでも、マット初心者でも、歴史的な魅力を少し加えながら動きとマインドフルネスのバランスを取りたいと考えているすべての人向けに設計されています。

rates.rateComment:
This onboard experience includes:
Pilates session in Amamoor and scones with tea and coffee.
